General.Name: Autopedia Sukses Lestari Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Autopedia Sukses Lestari Tbk engages in the auction of two and four-wheeled vehicles in Indonesia. The company is also involved in the retail sale of new and used car and motorcycles. In addition, it engages in the publishing of software; operation of commercial purpose Web portals and/or digital platforms; and provision of business consulting and brokerage services. The company was formerly known as PT Adi Sarana Lelang and changed its name to PT Autopedia Sukses Lestari Tbk in September 2021. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Autopedia Sukses Lestari Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Adi Sarana Armada Tbk.
General.Address: Graha Kirana Lt. 6, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14350
